title: DBRX: A new open LLM
dot:
digraph DBRX_Overview{node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray]; DBRX[label="DBRX: State-of-the-Art Open LLM
General-purpose LLM created by Databricks
Surpasses GPT-3.5, competitive with Gemini 1.0 Pro" color=lightblue]; Benchmarks[label="Benchmarks
MMLU, HumanEval, GSM8k
Outperforms other established models" color=lightgreen]; Efficiency[label="Efficiency
- 2x faster inference than LLaMA2-70B
- 40% size of Grok-1
- 4x less compute compared to MPT models" color=lightyellow]; Features[label="Features
- Fine-grained Mixture-of-Experts (MoE)
- 132B total parameters, 36B active
- Pre-trained on 12T tokens" color=lightcoral]; Community[label="Community Access
- Weights available on Hugging Face
- Train your own DBRX-class models
- Integrated into GenAI products" color=lightgoldenrodyellow]; DBRX->Benchmarks;DBRX->Efficiency;DBRX->Features;DBRX->Community;}
